thread.title: stuart kenyon

author: stuart kenyon
title: stuart kenyon
text: ok so I needed some tyres,didn't want to go and ring all the local garages for the best prices, so went on line and found these guys, booked the tyres, got a email confirmation, on the fitting day a gent called terry rang me to tell me he was on his way,guess what he arrived on time. He proceeded to remove the tyres and fit the new tyres, very pleasant man very knowledgeable. The chap was very quick and efficient and tidy would definitely use this company again. Thank you tyres on the drive if only it was all this easy.
